data.title: What resolution is TV shot at.
data.meta_description: What resolution is TV shot at? More to the point, should I buy Farscape / Star trek DS9 / etc. On dvd (for way to much money) or should I wait until

"The Search" SPIKETV, Fri May 12 12:00pm CDT

Capture one of these and try to IVTC it. You'll see problems on special effects, as it was edited in tv-ready interlaced domain, it was not done in the film domain. They want it to look best on the primary viewing device at the time, interlaced SD TV sets.
